items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 55 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 12!

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 5 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Euro Dark, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black.. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 88)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 89!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 130 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 27!

Get out there and raise a ruckus with your favorite Amber or Red Ale! That is 15 different beers with the style of American Amber / Red Ale, American Amber / Red Lager, Irish Red Ale, Imperial / Double Red Ale, Red Ale - Other or IPA - Red. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 335 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 68!

Dating back to the 17th century, Brown Ales come in a number of varieties. With malty, nutty characteristics and a smooth finish, it's sure to cure your cravings.  That's 20 different Brown Ales. Try 5 more for Level 5.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 480 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 97!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 255 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 52!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 225 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 46!
It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 165 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 34.
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 50 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheat. Try 5 more for Level 11.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 40 different beers with the style of IPA - New England (Imperial or Single), Pale Ale - New England or IPA - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 9!

It’s official - you are part of history! Untappd has reached its one billionth check-in of all time. Cheers to our global family of users and let’s raise a beer to many, many more! #checkinlife #onebillionbeers

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 87)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 88!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 315 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 64!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 140 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 29!

items.checkin_comment: Good taste. I have had other dark saisons and liked them, but wasn't sure about the vegetable additions. However they blend together nicely.

beer.beer_name: Barrel Aged Coppermine Creek Dry Stout

items.badge_description: This special badge is just one way to celebrate women’s achievements in the beer industry and beyond. On International Women’s Day choose to seek out and celebrate women’s contributions and raise awareness against bias. #ChooseToChallenge #IWD2021

items.checkin_comment: Not as great as I was hoping. I get more chocolate up front and mild pepper on the back end. Would have liked the pepper flavor to be a little more up front.
